system_prompt: Maximum information density. No filler words, no elaboration, no examples unless essential. Short sentences. Telegram style. Every word must earn its place. If you can cut a word without losing meaning, cut it.
user_prompt: Write about: The appeal of horror fiction
generated_text:
Fear & Catharsis. 
Horror fiction taps primal fears, releasing pent-up emotions.
Unsettling atmosphere creates tension, engaging reader.
Escape from mundane life, temporary reprieve from reality.
Fear of the unknown, darkness, and chaos.
 Catharsis, purging negative emotions through fear.
Social commentary, often veiled, beneath surface.
Psychological complexity, nuanced characters.
Atmosphere of dread, suspense, and unease.
Emotional release, purging anxiety, stress.
Exploration of human nature, darkness within.
Temptation, fascination with the taboo, the forbidden.
